getDesign

setWireAsUsed

protected Node setWireAsUsed(Tile t,
                             int wire,
                             Net net)
Sets a node (combined tile and wire) as used and maps the usage to the given net.

Parameters:
t - The tile specifier for the node to be marked as used.
wire - The wire specifier for the node to be marked as used.
net - The net using the node.
Returns:
The node that was set as used.

setWireAsUnused

protected Node setWireAsUnused(Tile t,
                               int wire,
                               Net net)
Sets a node (combined tile and wire) as unused and unmaps the usage to the given net.

Parameters:
t - The tile specifier for the node to be marked as unused.
wire - The wire specifier for the node to be marked as unused.
net - The net currently using the node.
Returns:
The node that was set as unused.

addUsedWireMapping

protected void addUsedWireMapping(Net net,
                                  Node n)
This method allows a router to keep track of which nets use which nodes.

Parameters:
net - The net using node n.
n - The node used by the given net

removeUsedWireMapping

protected void removeUsedWireMapping(Net net,
                                     Node n)
This method removes a node usage mapping to a net when it is being marked as unused.

Parameters:
net - The net currently using the node.
n - The node to be removed.

public java.util.ArrayList<Node> getReservedNodesForNet(Net net)
Gets are returns a list of reserved nodes for the provide net.

Parameters:
net - The net to get reserved nodes for.
Returns:
A list of reserved nodes for the net, or null if no nodes are reserved.

Examines the pips in the list and marks all of the resources as used.

Parameters:
pips - The PIPs to mark as used.

getSourcesFromPIPs

public java.util.ArrayList<Node> getSourcesFromPIPs(java.util.ArrayList<PIP> pips)
Creates sources from a list of PIPs

Parameters:
pips - The pips of the net to examine.
Returns:
The list of sources gathered from the pips list.

markIntermediateNodesAsUsed

protected void markIntermediateNodesAsUsed(PIP pip,
                                           Net currentNet)
Checks each node in a PIP to see if there are other nodes that should be marked as used. These are wires external to a tile such as doubles/pents/hexes/longlines.

Parameters:
pip - The pip to check intermediate used nodes for
currentNet - The net to associate with the intermediate nodes, null if the usedNodesMap should not be updated

markIntermediateNodesAsUnused

protected void markIntermediateNodesAsUnused(PIP pip,
                                             Net currentNet)
